comment.brief: An image can be stretched both larger and smaller.
comment.full: An image can be stretched both larger and smaller.

comment.brief: An image will only be expanded to fill up available space, it will not shrink.
comment.full: An image will only be expanded to fill up available space, it will not shrink.

comment.brief: An image will only be shrunk to fit in the available space, it will not expand.
comment.full: An image will only be shrunk to fit in the available space, it will not expand.

comment.brief: Specifies whether an image can become larger or smaller to fill the available space.
comment.full: Specifies whether an image can become larger or smaller to fill the available space.
